title: Wallester
author: Wallester
content: Wallester is a regulated company, holding a financial license. We are an official Visa partner and Visa Principal Member, issuing physical and virtual cards of any type for business for companies within EEA and UK. Offering our clients different packages depending on their needs, even a free one, as well as the in-house, built easy-to-use platform for monitoring and managing the expenses.We are the perfect solution for:- Advertising agencies, affiliate marketing companies- GIG economy companies- E-commerce platforms- Travel Agencies and platforms- All businesses who are looking for an effective way to manage their employees' corporate expensesAs an example, we are a great solution for companies who buy advertisements on Facebook, TikTok, Google Ads, or other platforms. Wallester innovative API ensures instant issuance of virtual cards for secure online media buying and lets you efficiently manage the budget of multiple ad campaigns on a single platform.We are offering a really fast onboarding process, a personal approach to the client's needs, a great plug-and-play financial ecosystem, which works through REST API integrations, and many more innovative features over traditional banks.If you still got questions, feel free to contact our sales managersÂ  https://business.wallester.com/contact-sales

Soon will be added other currencies also. As for the employee's cards, you can transfer money from your main corporate account to each employee's card without incurring any transaction fees. This allows you to efficiently manage your company's finances while providing your employees with a convenient way to access the funds they need. You can also choose between physical and virtual Visa cards depending on your preferences.Best regards,Wallester Team
